biotools.summary:
An integrated resource for human miRNA-Transcription Factor-Target Gene coregulatory networks and associated Feed Forward Loops.

Defence Institute of Physiology and Allied Science.

miRNA and Transcription Factors (TFs) are fundamental transcriptional and post-transcriptional regulators of the gene expression respectively, controlling important biological processes.
